about_the_game:
SCHOOLBOY ESCAPE ON STEAM!

You’ve been sent to the village to grandma and grandpa. Instead of letting you have fun, they’re piling on chores – weed the garden, paint the fence and feed the chickens!

You’ve had enough of this boring and exhausting village life. It’s time to make your escape and experience the freedom you deserve! But it won’t be easy, as your grandparents are always watching and suspicious your every move...

VILLAGE ANDVENTURE

Step into the shoes of a clever schoolboy who must navigate the tricky paths of his grandparents house and the surrounding village.

Your goal is to escape unnoticed. You'll need to gather hidden items, solve complex puzzles, and outwit the villagers and the old folks, who seem determined to keep you locked up. Stealth and strategy are your best friends – use them wisely to avoid detection and escape to freedom.

Keep your wits about you, and don't let the tense environment get the best of you. Interact with unique characters, uncover hidden secrets, and immerse yourself in a thrilling adventure where every move matters!

FEATURES

  • Stealth and Hide-and-Seek Gameplay: Sneak through the house and village while avoiding detection. Move quietly, hide in the shadows, and outsmart your pursuers!

  • Intelligent Characters: Grandma and grandpa aren't your only challenges - everyone in the village seems to be against you! Be smart and stay one step ahead.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve a wide variety of brain-teasing puzzles, find hidden objects, and unlock new ways to escape.

  • Crafting and Inventory System: Collect items and craft useful tools to help in your escape plan.

  • Adventure Action with Horror Elements: Experience heart-pounding tension as you explore creepy environments filled with danger.

  • Immersive 3D: Fully immerse yourself in this high-stakes escape game, where every detail counts and every corner could hold a new surprise.

Can you break free from the clutches of your overbearing grandparents, or will you be stuck in the village forever? Find out in Schoolboy Escape 2: Village, a thrilling adventure where wits, stealth, and strategy are your keys to freedom! Add it to your wishlist and wait for the release!
